channel.title: lukeholman on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in lukeholman on Luke Holman

item.description: I’m a lecturer in the School of BioSciences at the University of Melbourne. I mostly study the evolution and genetics of sex, sociality and communication. I combine empirical work on insects such as Drosophila and social Hymenoptera (bees/ants/wasps) with theoretical models, ‘omics, meta-analysis, and text mining. I am a handling editor for Behavioral Ecology, and the Reviews Editor for Journal of Evolutionary Biology. I’m a big fan of open and reproducible science, and so I often write detailed reports like this to help share my methods.
